title: Lucifer
description: Lucifer is a dark fantasy crime drama television series created by Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa. It stars Tom Holland as Detective Gabriel "Gabi" Stanton, a homicide detective assigned to a case involving Lucifer Morningstar.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer navigates the dangers of the criminal underworld.

title: Money Heist
description: Eight thieves take hostages and lock themselves in the Royal Mint of Spain as a criminal mastermind manipulates the police to carry out his plan.
